items.title: The RegionGCN paper is now published in Annals of the American Association of Geographers
items.description: A recent research article titled "RegionGCN: Spatial-Heterogeneity-Aware Graph Convolutional Networks" has just been published in the Annals of the American Association of Geographers, the flagship jo...

items.title: A collaborative research article published on Computers, Environment and Urban Systems
items.description: A collaborative research regarding "overlapping community detection from mobility networks" has just been published in Computers, Environment and Urban Systems.

items.description: Our recent study, A Visitor-Enriched Census in US Cities Using Large-Scale Mobile Positioning Data, was recently featured by the University of Minnesota in a campus-wide news article.
